title: Songwriting Is Hard Work
detail_text: <:th_ch0006/>I can’t.... The melodies aren’t coming to me at all....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Me too. I can’t think of how to write the lyrics for the new song....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Well, this is a problem, isn’t it. Even though there’s barely any time left before the next live....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>We said that we’re going to write a song while everyone else practices today, so we can’t really back out now, can we.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Yeah, let’s think about it some more. We’ll have to somehow get at least a rough idea of the song by the end of today....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>You’re right.... Oh, I got a message from Honoka.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Aaah, I guess it’s about break time over there.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>She said, “I’m at the convenience store right now, what ice cream would you two like? I think I’m feeling some vanilla today~”.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Ahaha! Geez, that caught me off guard. Maybe we’ve been focusing on this too much.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Fufu, that’s right. Let’s have some ice cream to refresh ourselves.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
